snippet: Nepalese prison authorities are searching for more than 200 inmates who escaped after last month’s devastating earthquake.
abstract: More than 200 inmates remain at large after escaping from Nepalese prisons during earthquake; 16 prisoners died in quake when Kathmandu’s central jail collapsed.
lead_paragraph: Nepalese prison authorities are searching for more than 200 inmates who escaped after last month’s devastating earthquake.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Nepal: Officials Seek Escaped Inmates
